languages.text: "Прощение даровано. Не чую греха на тебе, лишь полог незнания, что застилает твой разум".
"Absolution granted. I sense no profanity in you, only a curtain of ignorance drawn over your mind."
languages.original_text: "Прощение даровано. Не чую греха на тебе, лишь полог незнания, что застилает твой разум".

traits.locale_text: "Absolution granted. I sense no sin in you, only a curtain of ignorance drawn over your mind."
"Absolution granted. I sense no sin in you, only a curtain of ignorance drawn over your mind."
"Absolution granted. I sense no profanity in you, only a curtain of ignorance drawn over your mind."
"Absolution granted. I sense no profanity in you, only a curtain of ignorance drawn over your mind."
"Absolution granted. I sense no profanity in you, only a curtain of ignorance drawn over your mind."
"Absolution granted. I sense no profanity in you, only a curtain of ignorance drawn over your mind."

languages.text: "Absolution erteilt. Ich spüre keine Respektlosigkeit in Euch, lediglich einen Vorhang der Ignoranz, der vor Euren Verstand gezogen ist."
languages.original_text: "Absolution granted. I sense no profanity in you, only a curtain of ignorance drawn over your mind."

traits.locale_text: "Absolution erteilt. Ich spüre keine Respektlosigkeit in Euch, lediglich einen Vorhang der Ignoranz, der vor Euren Verstand gezogen ist."

languages.text: « Absolution accordée. Je ne sens nulle profanation en vous, seulement un voile d'ignorance qui vous recouvre l'esprit. »
languages.original_text: "Absolution granted. I sense no profanity in you, only a curtain of ignorance drawn over your mind."

traits.locale_text: « Absolution accordée. Je ne sens nulle profanation en vous, seulement un voile d'ignorance qui vous recouvre l'esprit. »

languages.text: “准予赦免。我认为你的行为并没有亵渎之意，只不过是你的头脑被无知的幕帘一时蒙蔽罢了。”
languages.original_text: "Absolution granted. I sense no profanity in you, only a curtain of ignorance drawn over your mind."

traits.locale_text: “准予赦免。我认为你的行为并没有亵渎之意，只不过是你的头脑被无知的幕帘一时蒙蔽罢了。”

languages.text: 「赦しを与える。お前には冒涜的な意図は感じられぬ。ただその知性に無知が垂れ込めているだけだ」
languages.original_text: "Absolution granted. I sense no profanity in you, only a curtain of ignorance drawn over your mind."

traits.locale_text: 「赦しを授ける。お前に不敬な意図は感じられぬ、ただ無知が知性に垂れ込めているだけだ」

languages.text: «Absolución concedida. No percibo ninguna blasfemia en usted, solo una cortina de ignorancia extendida sobre su mente».
languages.original_text: "Absolution granted. I sense no profanity in you, only a curtain of ignorance drawn over your mind."

traits.locale_text: «Absolución concedida. No percibo ninguna blasfemia en usted, solo una cortina de ignorancia extendida sobre su mente».

languages.text: "Af bahşedildi. Varlığında küfür sezmiyorum. Yalnızca zihninin önüne bir cehalet perdesi çekilmiş."
languages.original_text: "Absolution granted. I sense no profanity in you, only a curtain of ignorance drawn over your mind."

traits.locale_text: "Af bahşedildi. Varlığında küfür sezmiyorum. Yalnızca zihninin önüne bir cehalet perdesi çekilmiş."
